duties_responsibilities.duty: Paint interior and exterior areas of the property in accordance with Company guidelines.
Assist the maintenance team with service requests and work order requests.
Maintain neat, clean, and orderly work areas after painting or when work orders have otherwise been completed.
Order and manage maintenance supplies while staying within planned budget.
Assist supervisor with scheduling, communicating with vendors, and obtaining bids from outside contractors.
Accurately prepare and submit property invoices in accordance with established guidelines.
